Ability Improvements

You increase one Ability by 2, or two Abilities by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Ability Improvements is a Feats in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.
